// src/components/Local Manager Dashboard/CompanyProfilePage.js import React from 'react'; import LocManagerSidebar from './LocManagerSidebar'; import './CompanyProfilePage.css'; // You'll create this CSS file import { FiEdit2 } from "react-icons/fi"; const CompanyProfilePage = () => { // You can replace this with context or props later const user = { name: "Alexa Rawles", email: "alexarawles@gmail.com", role: "Local Manager", // or "Worker" location: "Amsterdam Brewery", nickname: "Lex", gender: "Female", country: "Netherlands", language: "English", timezone: "CET" }; return (

{user.name}

{user.email}

{user.role} {user.location}
); }; export default CompanyProfilePage;
